availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas J. Walker (Lewis County, KY, saddler and farmer)

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, saddler and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth G. Walker. Father of Mary E. Walker, Edward E. Walker, Francis M. Walker, Madison M. Walker, Joseph J. Walker, Sarah A. E. Walker, Jerusha A. Walker, and Frances S. Walker. Saddler in Lewis County in 1850. Farmer in Lewis County in 1850. Farmer in Lewis County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 2, p. 178B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, p. 785.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, Tollesboro, p. 512A.
Find A Grave, "Col Thomas Jefferson Walker (1804-1880)," Memorial #31843967, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/31843967# (accessed October 15, 2018).
